resources.string: Please click and select \"%s\" to allow %s to access this device\'s location

It is recommended to grant the "Allow all the time" permission to the MicroG service. The lack of this permission may cause some APPs to be unable to obtain the current location when running in the background. For example, Microsoft Team location sharing function may be affected.
Please allow %1$s to access this device\'s location. \nThe permissions are needed to enable location in map features of supporting apps.
Please select \"ALLOW ALL THE TIME\" to allow %1$s to access this device\'s location.
Please click on the \"Permission\u00A0Manager\" and select \"ALLOW ALL THE TIME\".
